data.name: Waste Disposal
data.notes: Take down the TLC plates too

data.name: Waste Solvent Disposal
data.notes: Make sure to bring back some empty carboys (if available)

data.name: Liquid Nitrogen
data.desc: Take it from floor 3 when it arrives
data.notes: Asada has been doing freeze-pump-thaw cycles recently, so need to fill it to the brim

data.name: Dry Ice
data.desc: Move it to the storage container
data.notes: Be sure to dispose of the plastic inside the container before filling it

data.name: Fume Hood Maintenance
data.notes: Won't be able to use the fume hood on this day

data.name: Mitsunobu reaction
data.notes: Didn't run under nitrogen last time and it was still fine. Repeat reaction to make more starting material

data.name: Wash glassware
data.notes: Make sure to put in the oven in preparation for tomorrow's reaction

data.name: BCl3/AlCl3 reaction
data.notes: Enough material for a 1g scale reaction

data.name: Sonogashira coupling
data.notes: Use the fresh alkyne when it arrives

data.name: Chemical delivery

data.notes: May need to order more AlCl3 soon
